onInstalled.message: Thanks for choosing Chrome Tabs Unloader. If you are new for Chrome Tabs Unloader, please see the user guide on Github.

onUpdated.message: Thanks for updating Chrome Tabs Unloader. Please see what's new in new version on Github.

appDescription.message: An extension which stops Chrome from eating all of your memory.

unloadAllFromThisWindowExceptThis.message: Unload All Tabs From this Window Except This

unloadAllFromThisWindow.message: Unload All Tabs From this Window

unloadSelected.message: Unload This Tab or Selected Tabs
